casebody.data:
Joseph CHENEY, Petitioner-Appellee, v. Louis STERNBERG, Trustee-Appellant. In the Matter of Melvin J. SCHNEIDER, Bankrupt. No. 249, Docket 22666. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued May 7, 1953. Decided May 7, 1953. Saperston, McNaughton & Saperston, Buffalo, N. Y. (Harry Wiltse, Buffalo, N, Y., of counsel), for trustee-appellant. Maurice Lutwack, Buffalo, N. Y., for petitioner-appellee.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
